    key_gf_nonraster

    draw_colorkey.Rd

    key_gf_nonraster

    key_label

    key_box(key, key.layout, vp, vp_label, reccentre, recdim, border = TRUE, ...)

key_tick(key.gf, key, labscat, vp_label, ...)

key_border(key.gf, key, open.lower, open.upper)

key_triangle(key.gf, key, open.lower, open.upper)

    Arguments

    key

    The parameter of colorkey

    key.layout

    The position

    vp

    viewport

    vp_label

    viewport label

    reccentre

    reccentre = (scat[-1] + scat[-length(scat)]) / 2

    recdim

    recdim = diff(scat)

    border

    boolean, the rentangle border

    ...

    ignored.

    key.gf

    returned by key.gf

    labscat

    at which to draw labels

    open.lower, open.upper

    The width of lower and upper triangle

    labelsGrob

    labels grobs

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
key.gf <- key_gf(key, key.layout, vp, vp_label, legend.line, reccentre, recdim)
} # }

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
key.gf <- key_label(key.gf, key, labscat, vp_label, legend.line)
} # }
